channel.title: e-commerce news and technical seo guidelines
channel.description: e-commerce news and technical seo guidelines

item.title: Google is building YouTube Connect, a livestreaming app to take on Periscope
item.description:
Google is building YouTube Connect, a livestreaming app to take on Periscope

Google has quietly been building a new livestreaming app called YouTube Connect, VentureBeat has learned. This service highlights the company's efforts to double down on live video while also placing it in a position to compete directly against Twitter's Periscope and Facebook Live. YouTube Connect will be available on both iOS and Android devices.

item.title: 5 Killer Conversion Optimization Techniques That Improve Your Rankings
item.description:
5 Killer Conversion Optimization Techniques That Improve Your Rankings

Conversion optimization and SEO have a rather symbiotic relationship - they rely on each other in order to function. Just as no salesperson can perform their job without a steady flow of customers in their store, no call-to-action can drive conversions without traffic coming to the website.

item.title: Coca cola Creates First Ever Drinkable Advertising Campaign
item.description:
Coca cola Creates First Ever Drinkable Advertising Campaign

" This is called a Real Branding Campaign " As ‪#‎coca_cola‬ says, "NEXT TIME YOU'RE THIRSTY, DRINK AN AD" A drinkable advertising creates the illusion that you actually taste the campaign and that's why they collaborated with Shazam, helping the audience enjoy a Coke Zero with the help of technology.

item.title: The Most Important Factor in Content Marketing
item.description:
The Most Important Factor in Content Marketing

The importance of content marketing continues to grow in its usage and its measure. It speaks for a business and their ideals through multiple forms of media. From social media posts to emails and websites the content being created for words must also speak visually through photos and video.

item.title: The Facebook Pixel - Why You Have to Use It
item.description:
The Facebook Pixel - Why You Have to Use It

It's no secret that Facebook advertising is starting to become one of the best ways to reach, engage and grow your audience online. So maybe you've jumped on the train - boosting a post every once in awhile and maybe you even launched a follower campaign.

item.title: How to Use Google Analytics to Improve Your Content Strategy
item.description:
How to Use Google Analytics to Improve Your Content Strategy

There are so many ways to excel at content marketing. You could try to out-publish your competition, repurpose every new piece of content into other formats or create content types no one else does. Still, nothing beats the data-driven approach.

item.title: Here's How to Combine Storytelling and Data to Produce Persuasive Content
item.description:
Here's How to Combine Storytelling and Data to Produce Persuasive Content

Ever thought about what really sticks out in your audience's minds? Hint: it's not the hard facts alone. Combining data and storytelling can make your brand's content stick out in a meaningful way; Nichole DeMeré shows you how in today's post.

item.title: The Brand Halo Effect: Does Brand Awareness Impact Organic Search Rankings?
item.description:
The Brand Halo Effect: Does Brand Awareness Impact Organic Search Rankings?

"The extent to which consumers are familiar with the qualities or image of a particular brand of goods or services." Oxford English Dictionary's definition of brand awareness How does anyone, not least a search engine, quantify brand awareness?

item.title: How Amazon's Alexa is bringing intelligent assistance into the mainstream
item.description:
How Amazon's Alexa is bringing intelligent assistance into the mainstream

To paraphrase William Gibson, "The future is already here and, thanks to intelligent assistants (IA), it is more evenly distributed than ever before." Based on our spoken input, mobile personal assistants (like Siri and Google Now) answer questions, navigate routes, and organize meetings.

item.title: How Content Curation Can Position Your Entire Organization as Thought Leaders
item.description:
How Content Curation Can Position Your Entire Organization as Thought Leaders

Let's be honest ... in the world of online marketing, the problem for you and your audience is not lack of content. It isn't even lack of great content. Each day humans add 2.5 quintillion bytes of data to the internet, publish two million new blog posts, and upload over 100K hours of video to YouTube.
